price: 25. Hubaal Rabbigaa waa soo wada kulmin iyagoo dhan. Waa Xakiim, wax kasta Og.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka huwa yaḥshuruhum innahu ḥakīmun ʿalīmun
